techmeme.title: Consumer Reports: many voice cloning programs, including ElevenLabs, Speechify, PlayHT, and Lovo, have flimsy barriers to prevent nonconsensual impersonations (Kevin Collier/NBC News)
X experiences intermittent outages globally, beginning early on March 10 (Charles Capel/Bloomberg)
SCOTUS refuses to hear BMC's appeal and revive a $1.6B award against IBM, which was accused by BMC of poaching a client in violation of a licensing agreement (Greg Stohr/Bloomberg)
Sources: DeepSeek founder Liang Wenfeng told associates he isn't in a hurry to get investment, including from government entities, fearing outside influence (Wall Street Journal)
Nirvana, which uses real-time driving telematics to build insurance policies for truckers, raised an $80M Series C at an $830M valuation, up from $350M in 2023 (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
